name: Fort Golf
description:
Fort Golf is a puzzle mini-golf platformer, with grid-based movement across small castle themed courses. Many different obstacles complicate the levels, and each level has a unique solution, which may not be as simple as it looks…

Putt Through Challenging Puzzles

Navigate through shifting platforms, deadly spikes, scorching lava pools, and much more. Each set of levels brings new obstacles and mechanics to figure out. With only a few hits to use, the solution may take some creative thinking.

Open Chests to Find New Items

There are chests scattered throughout the levels, each one containing a unique item. Add some colour by changing up the look of your golf ball with collectible skins. Unlock bonus levels by finding keys, and reach new areas with magical runes.
